import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import {downloadCv} from "../helper"; import "materialize-css/dist/css/materialize.min.css"; export default class About extends Component { render() { return (
ABOUT ME

A graduate in computer science with interest in web and mobile application Development. Excellent reputation for problem solving,excellent collaboration with teammates and very effective in terms of analysis and autonomy. Proficient in Java,c#,C++,JavaScript and Agile/Scrum methodology.

PERSONAL INFO
